content.title: Customize how invitations are sent to requests

default.title: Invite via Bidzaar
default.text: Addressees receive invitations from Bidzaar (noreply@bidzaar.com in the Sender field)

custom.title: Invite via your mail server
custom.text: Addressees receive letters from your company (your company's mail in the Sender field).
custom.sub_text: In the event of a failure of your server, Bidzaar will notify you and send invitations to the addressees.

email.label: Email from which invitations will be sent

username.label: Username for authorization on the SMTP server

password.label: Password for authorization on the SMTP server

success.info: Didn't find an invitation? Check your Spam folder or check your inbox a little later.

failure.info:
Make sure that:
1. Email of the recipient exists
2. Server settings are correct
